dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3979 IH: Keep America’s Refuges Operational Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Jeffries (for himself, Mr. Wittman, Mr. Grijalva, Mr. Graves of Louisiana, Mr. Sablan, Mr. LoBiondo, and Mr. Thompson of California) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Fish and Wildlife Act of 1956 to reauthorize the volunteer services, community partnership, and refuge education programs of the National Wildlife Refuge System, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Keep America’s Refuges Operational Act.

section.header: Reauthorization of National Wildlife Refuge System volunteer services, community partnership, and refuge education programs
section.text: Section 7 of the Fish and Wildlife Act of 1956 (16 U.S.C. 742f) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (d)(2)(C)(ii), by striking and may not be used for operation or administration of any non-Federal entity; and
in subsection (g), by striking 2011 through 2014 and inserting 2018 through 2022.
